segment.source: Using the MED-V Management Console User Interface
segment.target: Using the MED-V Management Console User Interface

segment.source: Using the MED-V Management Console User Interface
segment.target: Using the MED-V Management Console User Interface

segment.source: Using the MED-V Management Console User Interface
segment.target: Using the MED-V Management Console User Interface

segment.source: The console user interface is divided into the following sections:
segment.target: The console user interface is divided into the following sections:

segment.source: The following MED-V management buttons, which correspond to the three modules:
segment.target: The following MED-V management buttons, which correspond to the three modules:

segment.source: Policy—The Policy module is used to define the MED-V workspaces and their related settings and permissions.
segment.target: Policy—The Policy module is used to define the MED-V workspaces and their related settings and permissions.

segment.source: Images—The Images module is used to manage MED-V workspace images.
segment.target: Images—The Images module is used to manage MED-V workspace images.

segment.source: Reports—The Reports module is used for generating and viewing MED-V workspace reports.
segment.target: Reports—The Reports module is used for generating and viewing MED-V workspace reports.

segment.source: The toolbar displays shortcuts relevant to the button selected.
segment.target: The toolbar displays shortcuts relevant to the button selected.

segment.source: The display pane displays a module corresponding to the button that is selected.
segment.target: The display pane displays a module corresponding to the button that is selected.

segment.source: How to Log In to the MED-V Management Console
segment.target: How to Log In to the MED-V Management Console

segment.source: To open the MED-V management console
segment.target: To open the MED-V management console

segment.source: On the Windows Start menu, select All Programs MED-V MED-V Management, or on the desktop, double-click the MED-V Management icon.
segment.target: On the Windows Start menu, select All Programs MED-V MED-V Management, or on the desktop, double-click the MED-V Management icon.

segment.source: The MED-V Management Login window appears.
segment.target: The MED-V Management Login window appears.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: For security reasons, the first user to log in to the MED-V management console will become the only user on that computer allowed to access the management console.
segment.target: For security reasons, the first user to log in to the MED-V management console will become the only user on that computer allowed to access the management console.

segment.source: To log in
segment.target: To log in

segment.source: Type in your domain user credentials in the following format:
segment.target: Type in your domain user credentials in the following format:

segment.source: "domainnameusername", "password"
segment.target: "domainnameusername", "password"

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: When configuring the server, users with full access as well as users with read-only access are defined.
segment.target: When configuring the server, users with full access as well as users with read-only access are defined.

segment.source: All users must be domain users.
segment.target: All users must be domain users.

segment.source: The domain user name and password is used for MED-V management login.
segment.target: The domain user name and password is used for MED-V management login.

segment.source: Click OK.
segment.target: Click OK.

segment.source: The MED-V Management console appears.
segment.target: The MED-V Management console appears.
